room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: This is a very fun place. I loved the puzzles and little secrets that you find and can't wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Had an awesome time and our Game Master Addison helped keep us motivated in our time of need.. Definitely going back to try another game type.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: This was a great gift to some family members for Christmas. Even though we weren't successful in The Museum Heist, we had so much fun. I wish that you could pay more for some extra time because I wanted to be able to figure everything out. Emily was a great game master.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: This is the second Breakout I have done, the first was Museum Heist, and this time we did Island Escape. Both were so much fun!! We will be making plans to do the newest one (Hostage) hopefully very soon! Big shout out to Teddy, our host for both games for being so awesome! Can't wait to go back for more fun! Oh and of course, we broke out both times!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Well thought out and very clever! We did Museum Heist and it was definitely a challenge! But worth every penny! We had a blast figuring out the clues! And the clues were a challenge and well done! Great fun for everyone and everyone has a part in it! Great way for family and friends to spend a very interactive hour together... Something different and really nice and fun for a change! The game master was great as well! Everyone was courteous and helped to make it awesome!!!!!!! 5 stars!!!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: What an amazing experience! Chose to try this to celebrate my son's birthday with a friend of his. We thought it was going to be a full room but the others decided to not show so there was only 3 of us. At times, we completely thought we had it in the bag - but in the end it was too much for us and we were on the last clue when the buzzer went off. The experience was one that we will never forget.My son is now officially hooked and we will be back!!! Thank you for such a great memory to last forever!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Louisville in Louisville
review: Such a blast! We had a great time at the Museum Heist breakout! Highly recommend this for a fun night out. Also our Game Master, Logan, was awesome!
